mapper.select: SELECT * FROM test_schedule WHERE test_code = #{testCode} AND test_date = #{testDate} AND test_time LIKE CONCAT(#{testTime}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_schedule (test_code, test_name, test_date, test_time, capacity, reserved, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{testCode}, (SELECT test_name FROM test_fee WHERE test_code = #{testCode}), #{testDate}, #{testTime}, 1, 0, 'AVAILABLE', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE test_schedule SET reserved = reserved + 1, status = CASE WHEN reserved + 1 >= capacity THEN 'FULL' ELSE 'AVAILABLE' END, updated_at = NOW() WHERE test_code = #{testCode} AND test_date = #{testDate} AND test_time = #{testTime} AND reserved < capacity
